amendatorysection.para: Anyone violating any of the provisions of sections 81-501.01 to 81-531, for which no other specific penalty is provided, shall be deemed guilty of a Class V misdemeanor, and each day's noncompliance shall constitute a separate offense.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XXI, § 14, p. 749;
